scripts.crowdin-upload: export CROWDIN_DOCUSAURUS_PROJECT_ID="reason"; export CROWDIN_DOCUSAURUS_API_KEY=$REASON_CROWDIN_API_KEY; crowdin --config ../crowdin.yaml upload sources --auto-update -b master
scripts.crowdin-download: export CROWDIN_DOCUSAURUS_PROJECT_ID="reason"; export CROWDIN_DOCUSAURUS_API_KEY=$REASON_CROWDIN_API_KEY; crowdin --config ../crowdin.yaml download -b master
